description: Dell PowerScale OneFS, 8.2.x - 9.5.0.x, contains an elevation of privilege vulnerability. A low privileged local attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to denial of service, code execution and information disclosure.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: Version 9.2.1.0 through 9.2.1.22, Version 9.4.0.0 through 9.4.0.13, Version 9.5.0.0 through 9.5.0.3
